definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: For all, we have the Sunday school on Sunday morning.
sentences.chinese: 在星期天的早晨，我们为大家有主日学。

sentences.english: On Sunday, the first meeting is Sunday School.
sentences.chinese: 我们星期天的第一个聚会是主日学。

sentences.english: Serving as a Sunday School teacher and worship leader in church.
sentences.chinese: 在教会是一名主日学老师，并担任崇拜领唱。

sentences.english: The Sunday School teacher is expounding scripture right now.
sentences.chinese: 主日学的教师正在讲解经文。

sentences.english: Come and meet the kids from our Children Sunday School.
sentences.chinese: 来认识我门的儿童主日学小朋友。

sentences.english: Yes, I have seen homosexual infiltrate the church and Sunday school.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我看过同性恋者渗透教会跟主日学。

sentences.english: Pray for the Sunday School Ministry and teachers.
sentences.chinese: 为主日学的事工及同工祷告。

definition: to pray on behalf of sb
the will of Heaven/the will of God
to study the Confucian classics/to read scriptures or canonical texts
